description:
Haruna feels self-conscious about the size of her bust but ultimately decides that the quality of her character is more important than her exterior. Haruna finds a stray dog who turns out to be Rito. Mikan and Yami switch bodies to experience each other’s abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Become Bigger / Wonderful Life / The Trance of Feelings
Grossissez, je le veux ! / Wonderful Life / Transfo d’humeur
Ookiku Naare / Wonderful Life / Kibun wa Toransu
大きくなぁ~れ♪ / ワンダフルライフ / 気分はトランス
